description: Erection of a single storey front porch and side extension. Hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer and juliet balcony and installation of 3nos front rooflights
decision_conditions: The proposed enlargement would extend beyond a wall which forms a part of the principal elevation of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (e)(i), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Conditions A.3 (a) and B.2(a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes A and B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed raised platform is considered to be building operations for the purposes of Section 55(1) of The Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and there constitutes development which would require planning permission.
